alert.note: Alert for Charlotte (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Charlotte County through 415 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wren, or near Phenix, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charlotte Court House... Phenix... Red House... Wren... and Aspen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
